02.title: Created another website
02.description: I converted a website that I initally created using just html, css, and javascript to express.js. The initial website was a shop for some of the industrial furniture that I build and sell.

01.title: Simple blog
01.description: This is a simple blog site that I just created using express.js. Does not yet use a database, instead it is a .json file. Eventually I will covert this to use a mongodb.
